rdf:Description.dc:title: Climate warming? : exploring the answers 1990 exploring the answers /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Lilley, John.
Webb, Calvin.
Environment Council of Alberta.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, AB : Environment Council of Alberta,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Delivers a general understanding of climate change, including the physics and chemistry of greenhouse gases, role of greenhouse gases in climate change, human health concerns about ozone, implications of climate change and strategies to both reduce the speed of change and help Albertans prepare for climate warming.
AB Energy Edmonton: Planning and Development. Environmental Affairs.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Climatic changes.
Greenhouse effect, Atmospheric.
Global warming.
